alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 31 at 1:56PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * WHAT...Surf of 10 to 12 feet. * WHERE...South and east facing shores of all islands. * WHEN...through Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor. Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 156 AOAULI ASO SA IULAI 31 2022 ...O loo faaauau le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... * MAFUAAGA...O galu maualuluga ma malolosi e 10 i le 12 futu. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o le atunu`u. * TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Tofi. * AAFIAGA...Tulaga feoloolo. O le a malolosi le fafati o galu ma a`ave o le sami, e le saogalemu ai ona auau. E ono vaaia sologa i gataifale. O nisi o taimi, e maualuluga atu galu nai le maualuga sa fuafuaina, e ono faafaigata ai ona folau vaa laiti i uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O galu malolosi ma le maualuluga, sologa i matafaga ma gataifale i nofoaga aafia gofie, fa`apea aave malosi o le sami e fa`afaigata ai ona faia gaioioiga i le sami. O tagata tafafao i le matafaga, tagata auau, fa`apea le `au fa`ase`e i galu fafatai e tatau ona fa`autagiaina nei fautuaga mai le Ofisa o Va`ai Tau.
info.instruction: Some strong, breaking surf, occasional shorebreak and coastal erosion in vulnerable areas, and strong currents will make some water recreation difficult. Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
